name: .BNL
summary: Learn about .BNL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You cannot open or play a BNL file on a computer or mobile device. The only way to play a BNL file is to load it into a talking reading pen and "read" the book associated with the BNL file. Some talking pens include the Discover Talking Pen and JLB Educational Technology Pen Pal Whizz.
